column5: Just wondering if anyone has ever fished with them? I work in landscaping so some time i come across some.

I sure hope so ! i just ripped up my entire front lawn because of those lil buggers and got a jar of about 200 in the freezer lol - but I figure they couldn't hurt at least for crappie and other pan fish..i kept them hoping to use them with my little nephew so i wouldn't have to buy so many worms.

It's funny you posted this because I was just outside having a smoke and had to sweep up over 30 of those litter buggers off my driveway!  the house on one side didn't do his lawn recently and none on his drive, the house to the other side did his and he's got a bunch too.      either way, they are now in a jar waiting to have a date with a hook and a fish...
You can catch almost any fish on plastic grubs, there must be some logic behind that.
